PERSONAL STATEMENT

WHO AM I?

Motivated, adaptable and responsible Masters Graduate in Electrical Engineering who also has a passion for Information Technology. I am a self-taught programmer skilled in using C# and JavaScript currently seeking to progress career as an entry level programmer.

SKILLS & TOOLS

SKILLS AND TOOLS

JavaScript

I use it in Node.js, Angular5 and browser to bring websites to life.

C#

Most bigger projects that I tried were programmed in C#. I learned OOP, lists, events, delegates and more advanced algorythms using this language.

HTML

Cannot create websites without it.

CSS

I like to adjust already created projects to my liking. This site was altered from initial template as well.

Node JS

I use it to host my websites. Recently I started to use it for game developement.

Angular 5

Currently Learning. I have few simple projects that I am currently working on.

MongoDB

I am working with noSQL database to persist data for my projects.

Version control

Important to keep everything working just in case I screw up. I used Git Hub, GitLab and currently am using BitBucket. I prefer to work with SourceTree to have a visual representation of my repositories.

Visual Studio

Very good program when programming with C#. My main usage during game cration in Unity 3D.

Visual Studio Code

Really good for web developement. I use it to program my web solutions.

MY PROJECTS

MY FIRST HOSTED WEBPAGE
Attempt to create my portfolio website. Created with bootstrap and little bit of css animation.
CZAT IO
Web chat using sockets.io. Created using node.js and bootstrap.
TRIBUTE PAGE
Very simple project created during www.freecodecamp.org using bootstrap. Purpose of that project was to crate a tribute page to someone. I decided to make a tribute to everyone who tries to learn programming.
WEATHER
Project created during www.freecodecamp.org using bootstrap, plain javascript and jQuery. This website shows weather based on IP adress of user. It also allows to specify where location of weather check as well as changing type of temperature scale. Depending on weather it changes background of the page.

ADDITIONAL SKILLS

OBJECT ORIENTET PROGRAMMING

Experience in Object-orientated Programming. Used mainly in C# Unity 3D game projects.

DEBUGGING CODE

Experience in debugging code. C#, websites and node.js projects.

CODE REVISION

Cleaning and rewriting code is essential to make projects easy to read and understand even for other people. Making comments also helps when getting back to old projects.

CODE ANALYSIS

I am able to learn new concepts and technology. When programming my own projects I often have to go throug other peoples code in order to solve problems that have arisen.

UNITY 3D

My hobby. I use Unity 3D to create games or learn and visualize programming algorythms that I am learning. For example pathfinding.

MICROSOFT OFFICE

I often use Microsoft products. I have lots of experience with Excell and Word. I used them extensively during university to depict data or write science reports.

GRAPHICAL EDITING

I often use graphical editing software like GIMP or KRITA for my games or web projects.

ABOUT THIS PAGE

This website was created using bootstrap 4.

I used bootstrap theme crative. Link to the theme is available in this section for comparison.

I used CSS to change style of this template and add more animations.

Template was imported to my Angular 4 project and later updated to Angualr 5.

To host this project I am using node.js with express.

For hosting I am using Heroku.com
